rows.label: bf02220100_0010
rows.name: Oh man! This is delicious!

rows.label: bf02220100_0020
rows.name:
Yum-yummy!
So super very tasty!

rows.label: bf02220100_0030
rows.name: Simply exquisite!

rows.label: bf02220100_0040
rows.name: I haven't eaten this well in 120 years!

rows.label: bf02220100_0050
rows.name: Glad you liked it!

rows.label: bf02220100_0060
rows.name:
It seems like I did okay...
I was worried I'd have gotten a little rusty over the years.

rows.label: bf02220100_0070
rows.name: What are you talking about, it tastes absolutely delicious!

rows.label: bf02220100_0080
rows.name:
But Tora is curious.
Homura-chan is fire-using Blade, yes?

rows.label: bf02220100_0090
rows.name:
When Tora broke that water pipe,
Homura could still make fire!

rows.label: bf02220100_0100
rows.name:
Come to think of it, you're right.
That Kagutsuchi, the imperial Blade...

rows.label: bf02220100_0110
rows.name: She used fire abilities just like Homura,

rows.label: bf02220100_0120
rows.name:
but the water seemed to
douse much of her strength.

rows.label: bf02220100_0130
rows.name: So...what are you saying?

rows.label: bf02220100_0140
rows.name: This world full of elemental energy called ether, yes?

rows.label: bf02220100_0150
rows.name: Ether come in forms like fire, water and wind.

rows.label: bf02220100_0160
rows.name:
While battling, Drivers and Blades 
both draw power from ether.

rows.label: bf02220100_0170
rows.name: But fire not good with water.

rows.label: bf02220100_0180
rows.name:
Other Blade woman got splooshy with water,
so fire powers all damp.

rows.label: bf02220100_0190
rows.name:
But Homura and I were able to use our
powers with no problem.

rows.label: bf02220100_0200
rows.name: Indeed. They were unaffected.

rows.label: bf02220100_0210
rows.name: Why?

rows.label: bf02220100_0220
rows.name: Um, well, my element isn't fire so...

rows.label: bf02220100_0230
rows.name:
Mehmeh?! If powers not fire,
why look like flames?

rows.label: bf02220100_0240
rows.name:
Th-that may be a little complicated
to explain...

rows.label: bf02220100_0250
rows.name:
Go on then? Tora like
complicated things a lot!

rows.label: bf02220100_0260
rows.name: Ah, well, u-um, I, it...

rows.label: bf02220100_0270
rows.name:
Knock it off, Tora. Can't you see
you're making her uncomfortable?

rows.label: bf02220100_0280
rows.name: Meh...

rows.label: bf02220100_0290
rows.name:
Everyone has things they'd rather
not talk about. Right?

rows.label: bf02220100_0300
rows.name:
I'm sorry. I'm sure I'll be able
to tell you about it soon enough.

rows.label: bf02220100_0310
rows.name: Don't worry about it.

rows.label: bf02220100_0320
rows.name: Right now, we need to think about how to rescue Nia.

rows.label: bf02220100_0330
rows.name:
First, we go around town and find
all information we can!

rows.label: bf02220100_0340
rows.name:
Hmm, yes. I daresay that we're all wanted
criminals by this point.

rows.label: bf02220100_0350
rows.name: Homura sticks out like a sore thumb.

rows.label: bf02220100_0360
rows.name: I'm so sorry.

rows.label: bf02220100_0370
rows.name:
Don't worry friends!
Tora has an idea!
